{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Miniand |model=Hackberry |est_release_date=September 2012 |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A10 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F32G08CBACA |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G83CFR-PBC |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SD Card slot, |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188CUS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=soldered |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Power Management IC;X-Powers;AXP209;;1; ,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |flags=HDMI, SDHC, Audio in/out (3.5mm), IrDA, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;3.0.8;Android 4.0.4; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui=00:02:00 |oui_eth=56:DA:B4 }} {{TagLine|Development Board}}
